Content: Thumbs up for this app! The best thing is that if your phone crashes or you power it off, the reminder pops up when you reboot. It would be even better if it had a proper pill/medicine reminder function.

Good App This app does what it says it does, but the look of the app is a little jumbled and a lot going on, have used a more simple look before which I'd prefer still if that other app wouldn't crash, so have to resort to this as next best option.
